you_will_learn: learn how to interact with the linux shell
description: You received a backup of a directory containing documents, find the URL contained inside of a file using the Linux terminal. Commands you could use: tar, cd, ls, cat, (possibly grep). You can use the internet to search the meaning of these commands.

vocabulary.shell: a way to interact with the operating system using commands

hints: Brx fdq xvh wkh pdq frppdqg wr xqghuvwdqg zkdw grhv dq lqglylgxdo frppdqg gr.
.wdu.jc ilohv duh wkh htxlydohqw ri d cls iloh lq Olqxa, brx fdq xvh wkh wdu frppdqg wr xqcls wkhp (wdu -ai qdph_ri_iloh).
Li brx grq'w nqrz krz wr jhw Olqxa, Zlqgrzv kdv ZVO (orrn lw xs rqolqh), zkloh PdfRV lv xqla-edvhg (edvlfdoob nlqgd olnh Olqxa), zklfk lv jrrg hqrxjk.
goal: Find the file containing the URL, the URL is the puzzle key.
